title: How to rock and roll - Quora

response.answer_text: To rock n roll the first thing you need is to love the music. Try to listen classic songs of chuck berry, elvis presley, the beatles, rolling stones, pink floyd, led zeppelin, queen, ac dc, kiss, motley crue, motorhead, guns n roses, metallica,etc and as well as mordern songs of bands like avenged sevenfold, black veil brides, my chemical romance, greta van fleet, green day, etc. Once you developed a taste for rock n roll, no one in this earth can stop you. Choose a instrument, learn to play it, make a band, write and compose songs and play wherever you get a chance, even on the streets and set it on fire. Rock n roll!

Listen to rock n roll music.Read about the history of rock n roll.Hang out with people who appreciate rock n roll.Sing or play an instrument associated with rock n roll music.Develop a rock fashion style.
It’s very hard to describe how to jive, but June Cleaver can help:
How can I rock and roll? This way:) Electric Light Orchestra Rock'n Roll is King...
